A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Insane amount of plot convenience and poor writing. beginning was a 5/10 middle was a 0/10 and the ending a 10/10. Absolutely no suspense or risk for the \"Good guy\" characters. Everything was predictable to the extreme and they didn't kill a single important developed character. Incredibly poor if you are going for an intelligent well written story\, but quite nice if you are going to simply watch stuff happen on a screen for entertainment.  Would go into more detail including all the terribly made parts i didn't like but I don't want to write a book
